programme.desc: Spaceship - The dollhouse delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden before Floyd (who thinks it's the best kitty toy ever!) gets his paws on it!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Gabby Gets The Hiccups - The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hamster Kitties - When 6 adorable hamster kitties get loose in the dollhouse, Gabby, Pandy and Baby Box head out to look for them. Along the way, Baby Box learns a lot about hamster kitties, which convinces Mama Box to let them live in the Craft Room.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Kitty School - When Gabby unboxes a school notebook and lunch box, it's Kitty School Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy head to different classes held by the Gabby Cats to learn and live a day in the life of a student.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Kitty Cat Cam - When Gabby unboxes a new camera that takes pictures with silly filters, CatRat uses it to lead Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats on a photographic scavenger hunt around the dollhouse!

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Galapagos a Go-Go - When Odlulu uses the Become an Animal Key to transform herself into different animals, she accidentally disrupts the Galapagos Islands animal populations. It's up to Wally, Wenda, Edmund and Hillary to protect the Galapagos from Odlulu's creature chaos.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 Ep16
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Investigation Kit - It's the Royal Egg Hunt and Noddy's investigation kit goes missing. With Bumpy and Revs, Noddy soon finds some of his things, but not his binoculars. Someone must be using them, but what for? Noddy needs to find out in time before the Egg Hunt starts.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 Ep17
programme.desc: The Case Of The Upset Captain - Pirate Captain says he doesn't want to be the captain anymore. Noddy investigates how they can help him and he soon finds the reason for the Captain's distress: someone took his beard! Noddy sets out in search of the missing beard.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Homesick Tin Top - Tin Top just can't master corners no matter how hard he tries. The other cars try to help him to no avail until Roary hits on a brilliant plan.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Save Our Tree - Mr Carburettor is planning on cutting down Flash's tree. What can be done to save the poor rabbit's home?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Why Hippo Has No Hair - You see there was a time when Hippo did have hair lots of hair! She was always harumphingly hot. Then one hot night while Hippo was sleeping a spark from the fire caught the end of her hairy tail! Hippo was on fire! She ran through the bush until SPLOSH! Hippo jumped in the waterhole. And from that day on Hippo stayed in the cool waters without a single hair on her hide. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Why Tortoise Has A Broken Shell - You see there was a time when Tortoise's shell was all shiny and smooth. One day Tortoise discovered the birds were having a Feast in the Heavens and he tricked the Birds into making him a pair of wings. Greedy Tortoise raced the birds beyond the clouds and scoffed the whole feastt! When the Birds found out Tortoise had to jump off a cloud until BOOF!!! He landed on his shiny shell. All the animals pieced Tortoise's shell back together but from that day on Tortoise's shell was all bumpy and broken and he never moved speedily again. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Dollhouse Defenders - When Gabby unboxes masks and capes for her and Pandy, they become the dollhouse defenders and must save the Gabby Cats from Bad Guy CatRat! In the Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song about her garden magic!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Mixed-Up Dollhouse - When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all cattywampus and in the wrong place. After a series of wacky misadventures that result in CatRat becoming a craft version of himself, Gabby figures out they need to fix the dollhouse globe to return everything back to normal.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupp's locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Phil's Fun Farm - When Phil learns no one on the farm thinks he's fun, he sets out to prove them all wrong... by building a crazy amusement park.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Follow the Lightning: Part 1 - Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to D'Angelo and Alex.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 Ep12
programme.desc: The Ditch Sitch - The crew gets their first ping on their new creature-helping app! A dried up jellyfish-type creature has been discovered at a construction site, and the anti-creature contractor wants it GONE. The crew try taking Jelleen to the sewers to live with Sewer Koi, but the unhappy creature creates a blackout in the sewers with its magical electric charge. Realizing that Jelleen should be able to stay in her original home, the crew must stand up against the contractor and force her to see the error of her ways or else!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 Ep12
programme.desc: The Party Games , Trolly Tales - Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep23
programme.desc: CatRat The Bandit - The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep24
programme.desc: DJ Catnip Gets His Groove Back - Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats' everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Spark Bees , Best in Show - The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Superfan , Barb - Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, they're reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome to Harmony Harbor - Ari moves in to Harmony Harbor, but notices something strange involving a group of kids, a Noodle Truck chef and her pet squirrel. / After Ari discovers the secret of Team Zenko Go, he asks to join the crew. But first he must learn the importance of teamwork.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Delivery Disaster , Slippery Business - When Donna's delivery truck breaks down, it's up to the crew to help Donna continue delivering packages to Harmony Harbor's residents. / When the crew takes on a mission to rescue a lost pet, Ellie must face her fears in order to help save the day.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep23
programme.desc: King Burple - After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Charged Up - Magnus's superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the town's real heroes have to step up!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Stories - Artephius and the orphans are alone in town when a Celtic thunder god demands to be let into the treasure house - or he will destroy San Lorenzo!

programme.desc: Sphere - A piece of treasure that belongs to the Mole King is missing, and he won't give it up unless Puss helps him reunite with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezee's Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

But the key backfires and turns her into a toddler! Fritz must babysit Toddler Odlulu as she wanders through Mexico City, all while Wally and Wenda try to retrieve the Grow-Up Key and get Odlulu back to her normal age

So Wally and Wenda must use their dino-knowledge to wrangle these prehistoric animals before they overrun all of Mongolia.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep28
programme.desc: The Space Badge - Duggee teaches the squirrels all about the stars, the planets and the Milky Way!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Global Gameshow - It's the Go Jetters as you've never seen them before as they take part in a disco dazzling around the world gameshow!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Chocolate Hills, Philippines - Greedy Grandmaster Glitch has been gorging on chocolate and wants more! The Grimbots discover a place called the Chocolate Hills on Bohol Island in the Philippines and take him there.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep22
programme.desc: Mines of Mystery - Amidst Italy's ancient sites and hidden treasures, Thomas is inspired to make his own special discovery and goes on a journey to find a lost legend.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Leaves - There are leaves all over the place, Stanley tries to gather them up in his van with his leaf blower, but it is harder than he thought and fills Myrtle's house with them instead.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Mermaid - Fifi asks Stanley to help them find a Mermaid so they can take its picture for school. They explore the ocean floor in their search where they encounter lots of ocean creatures.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Matching Socks - When Monty can't find a pair of matching socks, he begins to wonder why things have to match at all.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep33
programme.desc: It's Time for a Roller Disco - JoJo is learning to roller skate, but there's not enough room. Time for a Gran Gran plan!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Promises - Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mum's word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why it's important not to break them.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Omelette - Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dad's birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Born Yesterday - Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Lucky's Dad's pie.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep33
programme.desc: The Island Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels are out doing a bit of sailing. What fun! When Tag starts to feel a little bit seasick Duggee suggests a stop off at the Island for a spot of lunch, but where's all the food?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep32
programme.desc: The Voice Badge - When the Squirrels start talking to each other in the wrong voices it's clear something has gone awry. But Duggee has his voice badge. He knows what to do!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Campfire Choir - Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn - from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Rainbow - After a rainbow appears over the Go Jet Academy, Glitch becomes fascinated with the legend of a pot of gold appearing at the end of it.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Fig - It's the nicest, kindest, Fig, performing his song, "Just Can't Help Being Sweet!"

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Apple - Apple sings in celebration of her great-great-grandad, Apple Tree's, 100th birthday.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Museum Mischief - Evil Pea pretends to help Supertato and Carrot train for crime prevention, but she tricks them and steals a mobile phone. Supertato and Carrot have a clever plan to get it back.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Broccoli Flies Again - Evil Pea asks for flying lessons when Broccoli flies her paper plane into her freezer. Evil Pea doesn't let Broccoli know that she intends to fly high to take over Tato Tower.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep76
programme.desc: Backwards and Forwards - The Teletubbies have fun moving backwards and forwards. The Tubby Custard Ride goes forwards, then backwards, then forwards again!

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep16
programme.desc: Shark - Dee encourages a friend to say 'shark' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of sharks! There's a pointy nosed shark and a big fin shark, a speedy shark and a grey and white shark.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep43
programme.desc: The Missing Star - It's Christmas time in Pop Paper City. Plom and Zip are decorating the tree, so they craft a new Christmas star. When Plom loses the star, its unknown if he and Zip will be able to find it again.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Ex-Static Messy - Messy's fur is all spikey and everything's getting stuck together! Will a trip to OKIDO's Valley of the Lost Balloons reveal the answers?

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep38
programme.desc: Cubby - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep47
programme.desc: Cricket - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Frog Song - It's fun on the counting train until Naughty Monkey starts to drive! Ethel makes a shape, Frog drops beats with a ribbit song, and Enid turns into anime to chase after a mouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep4
programme.desc: What's Hot? - Billy and the Sillies introduce a visit to chicken A&E, the Squirrels build a bug house, Norrie has her chance to shine, and the Penguins give facts about what's hot and what's not.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Rainbow - After a rainbow appears over the Go Jet Academy, Glitch becomes fascinated with the legend of a pot of gold appearing at the end of it.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Takeaway - Forced to wait five minutes in front of a restaurant for their takeaway, Bluey and Bingo become restless for entertainment, pushing the very limits of Dad's patience.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Fancy Restaurant - Bingo and Bluey want mum and dad to smoochy kiss, so they set up a romantic evening for two at their fancy restaurant. Everything goes to plan, until chef Bingo's special arrives.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Andy and the Painted Dog Pups - Globetrotting Andy, Jen and Scout are on a new mission in their Eco-Explorer: to discover more about incredible animal families and their babies.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Mission: Homework - Hearing dog Diesel visits Woofton library to work on Rayane's homework project - all about sound. But when their timer goes missing Diesel needs his super-ears to find it!

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Tamarin and Crowned Pigeon - Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet two amazing animals: this time it's the tamarin and crowned pigeon. Their wild connection is that they both have fancy "hairdos".

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep14
programme.desc: The Big Book of Pirate World Records - Captain Captain wants to get Sandy, Seaweed and herself into the Big Book of Pirate World Records and sets the pirates the task of trying to break a record to get their names in the book!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep30
programme.desc: The Colour Badge - Duggee is painting in his favourite colouring book. The Squirrels want to have a go too.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: Shiomi Hirokazu is one of the few experts in Japan entrusted with tuning pianos for concert halls. Whether tuning for a top pianist or a small child, his aim is to capture the sound in their heart.

programme.desc: At the Satoyama Kitchen guesthouse in Hida Takayama, chef Nobuko, her cameraman husband Makoto and their cat Tama take us on a tasty journey of local cuisine served with a side of seasonal scenery.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC311MakhachevvsMoicano
programme.desc: Champion Islam Makhachev looks to break the record for the most consecutive UFC Lightweight title defenses as he faces fan favorite Renato Moicano in the main event of UFC 311, while Bantamweight Champion Merab Dvalishvili defends his belt for the first time against undefeated Umar Nurmagomedov in the co-main. Plus much more action on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep8
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep19
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
